page.title: 17Hinton St George Village
page.content: Hinton is a peaceful village. The houses are mostly terraced but there are some big detached houses here as well. Some houses have steps at the front door that have a dip in the stone step where people over the years have stepped on them to go into the house. Many of the houses in Hinton are cottages built of hamstone with thatched roofs. Some of the newer houses are built of concrete blocks with tiled roofs. Hinton is a quiet old village but these new houses fit in with the old cottages. Hinton is quite a safe place to play, not like towns that have cars going through them all the time. I think Hinton is a very picturesque village.
